0.title: 27 YEARS
0.subtitle: IN THE WEB-SPACE
0.description: Many years of experience in developing, supporting and modernizing products for businesses of any scale is not just a part of our business, it is a part of our life! Working for results is our main goal, bringing results is our dogma.

1.title: EXPERIENCE
1.subtitle: NOT JUST A WORD
1.description: Government contracts, large enterprise systems, government organizations and medical companies. Responsibility worthy of the practice of interacting with a large client!

2.title: PRODUCT
2.subtitle: BEYOND EXPECTATIONS
2.description: The product is harmony, a balance of knowledge and the ability to transpose soulless machine code into a living project, under the guidance of the Client's thought! From Dreams to Reality, just one Button

hero.about_us: – is an IT company with many years of experience in the information technology market. We keep up with the latest developments and create reliable products that open new horizons for your business!

development.title: Development
development.description: At Ronix Systems, web development is a place where creativity meets functionality. We create visually stunning and emotionally engaging websites that reflect the essence of your brand. Our designs combine beauty with smooth navigation, modern UI/UX, and futuristic animations. Every detail, from the button to the block, is tailored to your company's vision and business goals.

web-design.title: Web Design
web-design.description: Customized comprehensive web design solutions that keep up with the times will not only emphasize the uniqueness of your product, but also boldly announce your business in the best traditions of marketing approaches. We bring inspiration to life through a unique harmony of colors, interfaces, and good architecture, linking your brand's name to the impeccability of your product!

Support.title: Support
Support.description: We know that support is important! Every customer is our friend, and we don't leave our friends in trouble. We know that nothing is impossible! Your problem is our concern. We will take care of any product-related headaches so that you can enjoy the results without worrying. Reliability and security are the main values of our support!

Hosting.title: Hosting
Hosting.description: A website is the temple of any business, product, or solution. It is a source of income, a source of education for potential visitors, and a personal outlet for every owner of an online resource. The website's activity should not be destabilized. The website should always be accessible, and our hosting equipment will ensure its availability. DDOS protection, regular backups, domain configuration, email servers, and much more are available at market-friendly prices!

idvit.title: IDVIT
idvit.description: A large medical system for pharmacists. Presented in the form of a website divided into an expert section (for Doctors) and a consumer section (for Patients). In addition to the public section, it includes an ERP system for organizing all of the company's internal business processes, from logistics to the calculation of microgranulates.

picasso.title: Picasso
picasso.description: ERP system for the Federal network of independent X-ray diagnostic centers. Optimizes the interaction processes between doctors, managers, and company clients. From analytics to working with estimates, it provides a full cycle of digitalized administration.

odkb.title: CSTO
odkb.description: Information portal for an information and analytical publication. The media section of the Collective Security Treaty Organization includes interviews, analytics, collections, author interaction systems, and thematic sections, all organized with a focus on ease of administration and native functionality for the end user (reader or author).

kardi.title: Kardi.ru
kardi.description: Development of an online store, administrative part, and a number of marketing systems for a unique technological medical solution – the KARDI line of devices. Rapid ECG readings at home, access to data analysis systems, and monitoring of readings history.
